steps.step: Step back left to 4:30 into a forward bow. Simultaneously, execute a outward hand sword to your opponent's left wrist and a outward hand sword to the side of their neck.
Pivot to a neutral bow as you strike the back of your opponent's neck with a inward hand sword.
Pivot into a foward bow (facing 4:30) with a uppercut under the arm (breaking their elbow against your bicep).
Execute an outward back knuckle to the floating ribs and a scoop to the groin.
Plant your right foot back into a forward bow as you perform a chopping punch to your opponent's head. Your right leg is kicking out your opponent's leg, causing them to fall as you punch.
